item.title: A Doctor Left 50 Cm Of Gauze In His Patient’s Nose
item.description: A routine procedure took an unexpected turn when a patient discovered a large piece of surgical gauze had been left behind. This story breaks down how such an error could happen, the symptoms that followed, and the accountability questions now being raised in the medical community.
